original_title: Biography: Dalai Lama: The Soul Of Tibet
overview: From a childhood in "Shangri-La" to a life in exile BIOGRAPHY-Â® presents the riveting life-affirming journey of His Holiness the Dalai Lama. One of the world's most admired men he is the spiritual and secular leader of a nation that exists only as a "Lost Kingdom."
title: Biography: Dalai Lama: The Soul Of Tibet
